source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
The First Satyr's Spaulders
Living Wood Spaulders

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,332 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Lurid Grips of the Obscene

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,764 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1.1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 10.1 million damage and pulsing 497,842 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Scythe of the Unmaker

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to Baradin Base Camp on Tol Barad. (4 Hr Cooldown)
